title: Two, Mississippi (2015)
overview: Two friends resort to playing Rock, Paper, Scissors, flipping a coin, and detailed, yet petty analyzation of their friendship to determine which of them will call the mother of their recently deceased best friend, informing her of his demise.
storyline: Alex is dead. Best friends Mark and Joe must decide between the two who will in form Alex's mother of her son's demise. They analyze and confront their friendship in the most logical way possible: endless games of Rock, Paper, Scissors.
